page.title: 08The Cavaliers Boys Football
page.content: We have boys' football teams called Chalgrove Cavaliers, this is our under 11 squad: Ian Moores, Paul Merrick, Mark Austin, Robert Hinton, Lee Combes, Justin Lee, Stephen Fletcher, Lee Northwood, Darrell Hoare, Peter Oliver, Dominic Oliver, Martyn Payne and a few more. Mr. Donny Rowan is our trainer, he's a Scotsman. This year we came third in our league, and we were awarded a prize as "The most improved team". We have won :- The Cholsey Six-a-side 6 - 0 and the Quarry Five-a-side We play our matches on the rec. Sunday mornings.
